title: Oprah Presents Meghan and Harry | Were You Silent, or Were You Silenced? | 1
description:
When we found out Oprah – the Queen of Media herself– was going to interview the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, we knew they were going to spill the tea. We just didn’t know how much! So we brought back Lainey Lui, of Lainey Gossip, to help us answer all our most burning questions. How does Harry really feel about his dad? Will they name their baby Diana? And where does the Royal Family go from here?

To read Lainey’s writing on The Royals, follow this link: https://www.laineygossip.com/Royals/Category/1055
